mapper.insert: insert into lm_user(vc_name, vc_username, f_age, vc_sex, vc_phone, vc_address) values(#{name}, #{username}, #{age}, #{sex}, #{phone}, #{address})
mapper.select: select f_id id, vc_name name, vc_username username, f_age age, vc_sex sex, vc_phone phone, vc_address address from lm_user order by id desc

SELECT t.f_id id, t.vc_userid userid, t.vc_name name, t.f_age age, t.vc_sex sex, t.vc_phone phone, t.vc_address address, t.d_begin_date begindate, t.d_end_date enddate, t.d_update updatetime FROM lm_user t
t.vc_name like concat('%', #{ name }, '%')
and t.vc_phone like concat('%', #{ phone }, '%')
order by id desc
